name: PixelPizza
description:
What is PixelPizza?

PixelPizza is just a simple game where you have to make more Pizzas as you can in a short time!

You have only 60Minutes to make Pizzas.

Do your Best and Improve your Skills Making Pizzas!

Future Updates?

I will add more kind of Pizza, actually there are only 3 kind of pizza that you can make!

I want to say that there will be not the Pineapple Pizza! THIS KIND OF PIZZA IS ILLEGAL! 

JUST REMEMBER THAT.

Kind of Pizzas in the Game:

Nutella = Just a simple Pizza with Nutella.

PataPizza = Pizza with Tomato,Mozzarella and Chips.

Margherita = Pizza with Tomato and Mozzarella.
